title: Lombardi’s Week 8 Watch List and Last-Second Fantasy Advice | GM Street (Ep. 331)
description:
The Ringer’s Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier link up to discuss Deshaun Watson’s dominance on ‘Thursday Night Football,' and highlight the top matchups to watch in Week 8 (0:30). Then Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly of ‘The Dantasy Football Podcast’ offer up some fantasy football advice at the midway point of the fantasy season (32:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
